text: Congo Bongo, oftentimes called Tip Top, is a platform video game made and published by Sega in 1983. == References == Category:1983 video games Category:Apple II games Category:Atari 2600 games Category:Atari 5200 games Category:Commodore 64 games Category:Intellivision games Category:MSX games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Sega arcade games Category:SG-1000 games Category:Platform games Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Congo Bongo
